description:
Installed with flatpak.

Won't start at all.

As stated on their website it does state that most distros ship an oudated evsion of ffmpeg and provides instructions on how to intall a newer version. At first it didn't work but after updating ffmpeg in does now work for ripping 4k
summary: Requires a newer version of FFmpeg

description: I've been using MakeMKV for a couple of years now and it has always done the job. Could be my imagination but the Linux version seems to run smoother than it's Windows cousin. This is "go to" software and I recently purchased it. You should too...

summary: Unable to find CDRom Drive in Fedora 29

description: I don't need wine - thanks for making a linux version
summary: Thanks for making a linux version

description: Ripped 1TB of blu-ray disks data that I own with no issues. Definitely useful if you are tired of using a blu-ray players.

Just like the title says, it's great for when you get a stubborn disk or ISO that wont just lie down and take it's reformatting as a man. This software will let you bend those video disk across your knee and teach them to be good little MKVs!
summary: Comes through when all other software Fails!

description: Got lucky and had a drive that could easily be flashed to support LIbreDrive installed already when I ran into an issue with the first 4k blu ray the inlaws gifted the kids. Since I don't want them to ruin the actual disk (and we don't have blu-ray players in the car...) I add all the kids movies to our Plex. Purchased MakeMKV a while ago when it was part of my windows ripping workflow and having it on Linux makes the transition that much easier.
It forces you out to download the latest version (1.6.7) from the website, since the Flathub version is too old (1.6.5). Please, update it as soon as possible.
summary: Outdated Flathub version, can't use it

description: The beta PPA is great and highly recommended
summary: PPA is the way to go here

description: I have used this on Windows and Linux both. Currently I am running on Fedora 32. I have used this program on Ubuntu as well. Follow the installation instructions on the site and it works fine. I have made MKVs from hundreds of DVDs without issue.
summary: Excellent! I have used this for years and it always just works

description: It doesn't compile BluRay files into a single file, it just changes .m2s files container to .mkv

Ein Klasse Programm für die Videoarchivierung.

Die Flathub-Variante hat jedoch einen kleinen Bug. 
Die laufende Anwendung verhindert nicht den automatischen Standby-Modus, so dass der PC nach der eingestellten Zeit in den Standby geht obwohl der Kopiervorgang noch nicht abgeschlossen ist.
Ich hoffe das wird bald behoben. Sonst top!
impossible to see or open a iso or vob file on debian 10
summary: impossible to see or open a iso or vob file on debian 10
